EmailTemplate.name: Follow up on Grand & Toy next steps (1562791030.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Follow up on Grand & Toy next steps (1562791030.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Monina,
I hope all is well! Have you done any stampeding yet?
I just wanted to touch base with you regarding the annual spend and the Staples invoices you were going to provide so that I can begin to complete a side by side pricing comparison for you and get you a new core list created. Sorry I didn't follow up with you on that at the end of June, things got busy and I assume the same for you since I hadn't heard back yet! The analysis I will prepare will show you the significant savings we can put into place for Secure and I look forward to working on that for you.
Let me know if you can gather that info to send over and I will get working on that right away!
Best regards, Jessica ShentonBusiness Development Manager | Alberta South 37 Aero Drive NE, Calgary, AB, T2E 8Z9 E-mail: jessicashenton@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:FirstnameLastname@grandandtoy.com]]> | Cell: 403-471-4959
